DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess effect high-fat meal ( breakfast ) concentration moxidectin measure blood single oral administration healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Effect Of High-Fat Meal On Bioavailability And Pharmacokinetics Of Single Dose Of Moxidectin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Men woman non childbearing potential age 18 50 year inclusive screening . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 body weight great equal 50 kg . Exclusion criteria Any clinical important deviation normal limit physical examination finding , vital sign measurement , electrocardiograms clinical laboratory test result . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study .
